website_summaries.verdict: Grill masters will love the ample 1,382 square inches of cooking area, user-friendly design, and heavy-duty construction.
pros: Includes sausage hooks and 5 smoking racks
Charcoal grate and ash pan are removable for easy fuel access and emptying

website_summaries.verdict: A tall vertical smoker with multiple grates that offers an impressive 1,382 sq. in. of cooking space.
pros: Dyna-Glo's Vertical Offset Charcoal Smoker & Grill is manufactured using heavy-gauge steel and has durable, oversize steel wheels to facilitate transportation
The analog temperature gauge features smoking, barbecuing, and grilling indicators to help you achieve your ideal temperature
The preinstalled sausage hooks offer an additional cooking option
cons: Because of the larger size and bulk, the unit may be mishandled during shipping and can arrive dented

customer_reviews.title: Bent pieces, broken welding
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all as this looks like a 2nd or floor model that has been moved several times. Likely a return as the box was double tapped back up, as i should have done. Dents in many pieces. Welding is very poor quality as some pieces are broke or non existent. The cylindrical axle on 1 wheel was completely missing. Bends in screws on front prevent closing and locking. I would not recommend this product. Nervous to fire up as the pieces don't align and it's clear their are gaps that will cause heat lose. Worst purchase to date.
customer_reviews.author: Paolo Roma

customer_reviews.title: 2x and damaged both times
customer_reviews.text: Really don't know how this product works. The 1st attempt, I spent about 20 mins out of box and separated. I start to assemble and notice a huge dent in barrel. I had to tape box back up and pack everything back. That was an hour and half of my life that I would like back. On the 2nd attempt the smoker was damaged when I open the box. I will return it again. This is a big problem as the box weighs over 120 pounds and I have to take it back to the UPS center. The time and effort for this smoker is really not worth it and trying to contact amazon is virtually impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Culbreath

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I have no regrets on purchasing this ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I have no regrets on purchasing this smoker. I did use it the first weekend after receiving it, real easy to control heat and smoke.. Very simple to put together "only a 2 adult beverage project"... Recommend to anyone interested....
customer_reviews.author: Tony Fontenot

customer_reviews.title: Dyna glo smoker is a good starter smoker.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great I have used it several times since I got it. It was easy to assemble and seal. I seasoned it. The only problem or complaint I have is on long smoke jobs above 8-9 hours the bottom of the firebox fills up and it is hard to remove the ash. I tried a 16 hour smoke on 60 lbs of brisket for a large family get together. Ended up using a little self made hook to pull ash through the air vent on the side of the fire box drawer.
customer_reviews.author: James Moore

customer_reviews.title: Bark me Bad
customer_reviews.text: From an arrival perspective, yeah, I had to bang out some dents just like the other reviews. If you think a smoker is a set and forget, you’re delusional. There are other products that you can set and forget, but they are not true smokers. I purchased the lava felt and the grill caulk...not a single leak. Just smoked 16lbs of butt and nothing butt beautiful. As long as this can hold to weather, I’m all in on this smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Top damaged!
customer_reviews.text: I unloaded the box and when I pulled out the vertical barrel the top was dented in where the smoke stack attaches (see photos). The box was not damaged, so in my opinion someone loaded a damaged product in the box. Needless to say, I'm mad! If this happens from the factory, I can only imagine that their Quality Control and Product Support is very poor! Pissed!!
customer_reviews.author: mark westerfield

customer_reviews.title: Amazon should double check the products before sending it to costumers.
customer_reviews.text: Broken door, broken heart. This was my husband’s Christmas gift. So, no gift from Santa to him for now.
customer_reviews.author: Roush0521

customer_reviews.title: Fuel Hog
customer_reviews.text: For the money, I believe the smoker is well built. The problem I am having is that it does not hold a consistent temperature and I have to add a whole lot of fuel to keep it going. I have found on a long smoke, for example, I cannot simply load up the charcoal box and forget it. It takes constant monitoring and requires continuous additions of fuel. Not very user friendly. Also, on a long cook, there is really no way to empty the ash from the fire box. I have relegated this thing to a cold smoker for my country hams. It works pretty good for that.
customer_reviews.author: William Bass

customer_reviews.title: So happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a traditionalist. I grill and smoke with wood. No electricity thank you. I got this last year and could not be happier. This is my pride and joy of my outdoor equipment. The first time I used it, I made a pork shoulder that was perfect. It took a couple of hours to put this together but it wasn't really hard. I replaced the plastic wheels with rubber tires and insulated all the openings with gasket lining. This was a very good purchase unless you like shortcuts like grilling with electricity. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased for my husband's birthday. All the holes and clips are misaligned. We had to redrill holes and cut off areas just to mount the door properly. It is still off. We bought in April 2019 and keep it clean and covered but it is already rusting and chipping. The temp gauge has stopped working and has water in it. The misaligned door has to be lifted before clamped which is difficult when it is hot. The door clamps are hard to adjust. Update 9/2020. Already complete rust and falling apart. Even using a cover to protect it from elements. The smoker door fell off and crumbled. Handles falling off and rusted out. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy B

customer_reviews.title: An excellent offset vertical smoker!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and so far, I've only assembled it and seasoned it. The packaging was fantastic and the product arrived in great shape. The hardware for assembly was all kept in a nicely designed laminated paper storage system. I should state that I did a couple modifications right of the bat. I added gasket tape to the doors of the vertical smoke chamber and also applied a moderate amount of high temp food-rated silicon to welded edges and connecting pieces. I can't wait until Saturday! We'll be doing buffalo burgers and brisket!
customer_reviews.author: Collin N.

customer_reviews.title: Grill is good. Shipping was not.
customer_reviews.text: So grill got delivered with the smoking chamber dented to hell and it is from packaging and the handling. Heavy grill and nothing on top in the box to protect it during shipping. Had people coming over banged out some of the dents and assembled. After running insulation strips around the doors where I could ( dents at the top don’t allow to run all the way ) it does a pretty good job. Have still turned out some really good food just disappointed in the dents. I have notice that the ash fills quick so might have to get creative on getting some out on cooks longer than 5-6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: fan

customer_reviews.title: Ok smoker if you put some time and effort into it.
customer_reviews.text: Like most reviews, the shipping box was destroyed and a few parts were bent and/or scratched all to heck. It just takes a little work straightening and some hi temp touch up paint. As for design, make sure you plan on purchasing some form of smoker/BBQ grade sealer as there are a lot of gaps that if left u touched, will let a lot of heat and smoke out. Aside from that, it's a decent smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Gehrer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t assemble with broken screws
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice when halfway put together however the screw was messed up and it couldn’t be completed. Disappointed that a grill over 250 dollars doesn’t have the proper pieces to put together. Still waiting for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To make the other men jealous
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for fathers day. Its huge, the other guys and neighbors ate jealous and always commenting to their wives about how they want one lol. We use it all the time and it fits our cast iron pots perfectly. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mccafn

customer_reviews.title: Nice design just needs some improvements
customer_reviews.text: Well after banging out couple small dents and buying screws and nuts to replace missing ones. I like what I see so far. Box was open but may have been from unloading (very heavy) do recommend buying the lava lock gasket maker and door seals. Mine is leaking but would be lot worst if I hadn’t installed. Assembly definitely takes 2 certain parts are a hastle.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda n James

customer_reviews.title: Dyna-glo smoker
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with my smoker. It was easy to put together with the help from my wife. The 2 screws that people talk about was no problem for me. The only thing I see wrong with it and it doesn't effect the smoker is they put the model # plate upside down. Will season tomorrow after lavalock dries.
customer_reviews.author: CKP

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Very good smoker for the price! The only thing I can complain about is that there was no instructions included for assembly. Luckily, I’m very mechanically inclined and was able to figure out how to assemble this. The smoker cooks very well and maintains temperature well. Very happy with this purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: mark d. rubenkoenig

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Metal is too thin to regulate temperature. If you have all day to dick with this thing and thrive on mediocre performance...by all means...waste you time and money. Mine is going to the scrap yard
customer_reviews.author: y

customer_reviews.title: My first smoker
customer_reviews.text: Unit is pretty easy to assemble but it took a while to get it full sealed. I had a hard time getting the temperature up while smoking in the late fall and winter so I added a electric coil so I could smoke a turkey for Christmas. It came out amazing. Great smoker now. Only thing I wasn't happy with is the welding, most of the welding joints are more like a tack then a full weld joint.
customer_reviews.author: MrWolf

customer_reviews.title: I should have known better
customer_reviews.text: Im going try and be fair with my review. Its not bad for the price. But being used to a UDS this smoker is disappointing. I can get the consistently where i want them. And when I do get it there it won't stay there but for a few minutes before the tenps start dropping. This thing also consumes a lot of charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this smoker for my husband as a Father's Day gift. He'd been saying for a few years that he wanted to buy a smoker, and he spent time researching off and on for one. He ended up finding this one and another brand smoker under a hardware store website. I asked my brother to help me research smokers, and he sent me a list that included the Dyno Glo. I was sold and simply hoping I could find it here on Amazon - TAH-DAH! And ... I placed the order on 6/14, and it arrived on 6/18. My husband has used it a couple of times this summer, and it has worked beautifully. Fantastic purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Time to Smoke..
customer_reviews.text: This is badass. It is big, and most likely a man will need to assemble. Sorry ladies... Took me 1 hour and 15 minutes. You need room to spread out and get all the parts out. But putting it together was a breeze. The first run was OMG !!! Best smoker /Grill I have ever owned. Way better then Oklahoma Joe's crap.... Thank you A++++++
customer_reviews.author: john baehr

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a nice smoker and after reading reviews and tons of research I heard this brand was top of line. So I gave it a try, easy to assemble (depending if your handy), after firing it up first time and doing a dry run through then u can use it. I can cook so many things at once with all the shelving, and it holds heat well. Very pleased. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: OZ

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I gave this grill a long time before I reviewed. I bought in March. Firebox started rusting after 3 uses. The grill has never been in the rain(even now). 5 months later and firebox is almost gone. No where to order another because I’ve looked. Don’t sell a grill for this high of a price. Especially,’if it is just going to start rustOmg after a couple uses. Will never buy this brand again. I will go with one that actually cares about the customers and offers to replace or cares.
customer_reviews.author: christina mcdade

customer_reviews.title: Excellent smoker
customer_reviews.text: This is the best smoker that I have used. Temperature was kept low with water for an excellent smokey flavor. This is constructed with heavier gauge steel that will last longer. When assemblying use high temp sealer or you will have leaks and a hard time maintaining temperature. Can easily hold 3 full pork loins - smoked for 10 hours. As others have indicated, removing ashes while smoking is difficult - but can be done.
customer_reviews.author: john stuart

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Since I purchased my smoker and definitely have a new hobby! I’m still experimenting with rubs and have a long way to go but my family, friends and I really enjoy smoking new recipes!
customer_reviews.author: freddy sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I only gave it three stars is because of the dents that it arrive where. Other wise I am very satisfied and enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Karl R

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this smoker.
customer_reviews.text: I switched from a horizontal cross flow to this vertical smoker. Three smoke sessions later and I wonder why I didn’t do this sooner. I had 70 pounds of pork shoulder on this and there was still one shelf empty. This is easy to assemble but heavy. The style of door latch could be a little better, but overall this seems to be a great smoker.
customer_reviews.author: g c

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to replacing my very old smoker with this one. This is well-built, works very well, looks great, takes-up less patio space than my old one, and has tons of space inside. One thing I really love about it is the smoking hooks around the smoke stack, can’t wait to make jerky in it!
customer_reviews.author: Scott McGough

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: All is good with the smoker it Cooks great we have smoked alot on it the only thing you have to do is by the sealer to go with it it does leak alot with out it. It could also be a little higher of the ground had to build a rock deck for it. of not you have to bend over alot if you are tall
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Smoked 60lbs of pork for a party for the first use - PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: No assembly instructions enclosed so assembly took a little longer using the photo. First time out of the barrel, it worked just as advertised, and the pulled pork was great after 12 hours of smoking. This is a real value for the money. Guests thought it cost 3 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marx

customer_reviews.title: tremendous bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Well designed, reasonably heavy gauge steel. Nice latches for door. It does most of what an expensive Lone Star or other offset does for 1/5th the cost. I gasketed door and siliconed firebox joint, but maybe unnecessary. Running this as a true stick burner yields great q. it requires tending every 45 min or so, but any stick burner does. Once at temp, holds 275 easily. Start with a small load of charcoal, then add some wood, once a good fire going its very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory F Lepore

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I definitely needed a seal on the door. It was not too difficult to assemble. It took a couple of hours. I'm not a pro bbq person but the things I've cooked on it was good. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: CMH

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: After putting together which took 3 hours. It was damaged and would not shut. So absolutely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Rumpir8

customer_reviews.title: Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Delivered to the neighbors door and damaged on two places and bends on few , not happy with handling and delivery Only good for trash
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Worst ever penny
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in great condition,no dings or missing parts. It took me 2 & hours to assemble this baby. The directions made it super easy to piece together. I also recommend you getting the gasket insulation tape!!! I will give another review once I use it later today
customer_reviews.author: Imjustrene

customer_reviews.title: Their customer service sucks! Phone numbers are not valid and they do not respond to emails!
customer_reviews.text: Smoker worked great!!! Assembly was a little tougher since I did not receive a few screws! Box came in banged up and the thermometer was 20 degrees off. When you try to call you get busy tones and when you send emails you get no response!! Great product crappy service!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: I like it but,...
customer_reviews.text: I like this and other smaller smokers I have bought from DynaGlo. I seem to always have difficulty making the door close as well as it should. this was no exception. For the money though, this is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Merchandise came to me dented in various locations. The nuts and screws were out of the box. I now have to and and purchase some more nuts for final assembly...
customer_reviews.author: Oneil  Samuels

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!!!!! Great smoker
customer_reviews.text: Got this smoker in today, did the sealing mods with lava rock tape, and sealant, ( HIGHLY RECOMMEND) doing test fire/ seasoning at 400-450, absolutely no leaks, holding steady at temps with hickory and applewood. GREAT SMOKER, HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!! I saw all the shipping headaches, but honestly this one came in great!! Easy to put together, seems like it will be a great smoker to last the test of time!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Halloween

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We love this smoker! We had to sell our first one when we moved and almost cried. Now we are on to our second grill and are just as pleased with it. The wood box is nice and big and we use cherry, mesquite, white oak and apple wood.
customer_reviews.author: jjwilly4ever

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker
customer_reviews.text: This a great smoker for the money. It took about an hour and a half to assemble. Which wasn’t that bad. You need a stand about 18” off the ground to make it chest high if you’re 5’11” like me. Buy the high temp sealant because it will leak at the junction of the offset. It did maintain 225-230 during the curing phase. We’ve smoked four 8lb butts and grilled steaks. They were delicious. But the smoker, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Travis F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the smoker. The fire box is low to the ground so if you want to cook burgers or steaks be ready to bend over to cook on the grill grates. The smoker works fantastic but the inner drip pan is a bear to clean up
customer_reviews.author: Donald Green

customer_reviews.title: Damaged smoker bbq
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the cover and all the accessories hope the work out on my damaged product so sad and disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kelly yon

customer_reviews.title: Dyno-Glo shipping
customer_reviews.text: The top was dented around the smoke stack. The door latches were bent. The box appears to have been a return. With repairs, I believe it is fixed, although I could use new door latches. I have not had time to smoke something.
customer_reviews.author: Harold C. Hipp

customer_reviews.title: Great Vertical Smoker!!!
customer_reviews.text: This vertical smoker is everything I was looking for except for two things: 1) The firebox is low. 2) The firebox is nod ideal for grilling because of the size (rather small). Other than that, it's a great smoker. The heat is distributed evenly, the temperature is easy to maintain, and the gauge of steel (thickness) of the main chamber is perfect for holding heat!!! Overall, I'm giving it 5 Stars. Great investment!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Coach AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect backyard smoker. The price is cheap, but the quality exceeded my expectations. Now we just need a fence to keep the neighbors out!
customer_reviews.author: Vereinfachen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not vertically challenged.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were clear and accurate, but it did take quite a while to put it together. Smoked a brisket the next day, after burning it in, and it came out absolutely perfect. I love a vertical smoker
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: A part was broken at delivery. I went through the process the manufacturer dictated. Email, photos etc. We finally called and got immediate satisfaction. They sent two replacement parts. Having read the reviews at purchase we added the seals as we assembled. We love it. As a grill it is very low to the ground. Grease leaks out across from grease pan through a nut and bolt.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Love It. Don’t Hate It.
customer_reviews.text: I’m torn on how to review this product. I don’t love it. I don’t hate it. Mine arrived with a large dent on the top of the main compartment, two broken welds on the fire box shelf, and missing screws/bolts. Without modifications (sealing, repairs) I don’t think this smoker stands up to scrutiny. It’s worked well enough, but I’m not impressed with the initial quality. If you don’t want to DIY improvements you’ll need to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It. Smokes.
customer_reviews.text: After assembly (that took so time). My boyfriend’s major complaint was after the first time he had used this, the paint on the inside as well as out side started to chip and peel off. Other than that, The BBQ or “smoker” , as my boyfriend calls it,works pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: J STARR

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker just one small complaint
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker just one small complaint.... I wish you could pull the racks out without turning them to the side to remove them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Compagnoni

customer_reviews.title: great investment
customer_reviews.text: my husband was as happy as a kid in a candy store when this baby came in! we used it for NYE and were loving out meat!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Galajyan

customer_reviews.title: Like it; don't love it
customer_reviews.text: My issues are more related to the durability of the hot box - the sliding tray and its grate both warped from the heat and there is a rust-like discoloration on the outside after 6-8 uses. Reports of needing to refuel for long cooks or fuel burning quickly are consistent with my experience. It has been fun to cook multiple slabs hanging from the hooks
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good smoker, spend the money on the sealing tape and the custom cover
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Watch delivery
customer_reviews.text: The product is great! I used it once and and temp issues so I added a door seal... Solved my problem and love it even more!!!! The only issue I had was the delivery... Looks like they just pushed it off the truck, the top was dented in and had to take a hammer to it.
customer_reviews.author: Dale McCarraher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected, more than enough area for lots of smoking
customer_reviews.author: daniel blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Love this smoker!
customer_reviews.text: So far I have smoked beef ribs, whole chicken and a Turkey. Smoker is heavy duty and holds heat/smoke very good (I used Lavalock Gasket and sealant to seal minor gaps). I am super pleased with this smoker!!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: did not come with instructions
customer_reviews.text: it did not come with instruction to assemble BUT i got it together and i am very happy with it. Just make sure the top vent is wide open when you smoke with it. Makes great ribs!
customer_reviews.author: The Crow Flies

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker !!
customer_reviews.text: Love it !! Once I sealed it. I have been experimenting with different meats and getting the hang of my smoker. Heavy duty smoker ! Great price. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Eric Orozco

customer_reviews.title: A little more than flipping hamburgers.  Cook  without fighting a fire all afternoon.
customer_reviews.text: Not only a cooker but should provide outdoor entertainment for whole family as BBQ and smoked meats come off the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh H. Craddock

customer_reviews.title: Smoking good
customer_reviews.text: Assembling was understandably but very long and when attaching the heat chamber to the smoke chamber I had a trouble and it was a little hard to screw the bolts. Other than that my first brisket turn out to be fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: sidney lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My husband has smoked everything under the sun. Not disappointed at, just sick of smoked flavored meat!!! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Jeni M

customer_reviews.title: Poor shipping
customer_reviews.text: Arrived taped up and dented. Missing hardware. Had to go to the hardware store to replace missing metric nuts and bolts. Easy to assemble. Fit and finish was off. Barrel dented on back side. Door not square with barrel. If it wasn't for the poor shipping and damage, I would recommend this smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Joseph Witthar

customer_reviews.title: Upright smoker
customer_reviews.text: Took as long to unbox as the instructions said would take to assemble. After recommendation for seasoning I have used it once and like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Dyna-Glo smoker.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this smoker for a little over a year and it's been really nice smoker kind of hard to assemble by one person alone but I got it done and you want to definitely buy the seal kit to seal it all up because it would be leaking smoke all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Hill

customer_reviews.title: We enjoy every weekend
customer_reviews.text: The smoker arrive damaged however with my sheet-metal not loose I repaired without any complaints the smoker it’s self is fantastic and does a great job
customer_reviews.author: Xyz

customer_reviews.title: good quality, huge capacity
customer_reviews.text: impressive and works good cooking lots of salmon fillets. I added wire baskets for the grills. Was a hit for a Friendsgiving dinner party.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mark Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy, but easy to maneuver and doesn't take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I needed for my Homemade Beef Links. It took about 45minutes to an hour to assemble. I highly recommend applying a gasket seal around every opening, to prevent leakage of smoke.
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: got this for my son as a gift. he loves it, said it works better than smokers he's had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Birch61

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble with great hardware. It will take some after market modifications to fully tune it in but great value!! Huge cooking area!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Loose

customer_reviews.title: Could not keep temp high enough and fire gets snuffed from poor fire box design.
customer_reviews.text: Fire box to small. Poor design, hard to get temperature over 200 F because of fire box design smothers out the fire. Totally worthless as a smoker. Can't remove ashes while cooking, so cooking anything over a few hours is not going to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Barker

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome smoker. Holds temp extremely well. I can leave for nearly an hour and it will sit right at 225. I’ve smoked chicken, duck, salmon and brisket in this thing and all turned out fantastic. It’s a little hard to squeeze a brisket over 10lbs in as they’re often longer than the smoker is wide but otherwise perfect smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Norton

customer_reviews.title: Smoke heaven!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my boyfriend and he is super stoked! He has been smoking every weekend and it cooks great! I was very surprised at how heavy duty this is. Much bigger than I expected but very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Rene Wainwright

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to control heat.
customer_reviews.text: I must admit that I was a little skeptical about buying a manufactured vertical smoker. I read many reviews on this, (and others), and boy am I glad I went ahead and purchased this awesome product! I have never had a smoker that I was able to maintain the heat as easy as this Dyna-glo. I have cooked 6 racks of ribs, pork butts and various other meats on the pit and all were AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon McCaslin

customer_reviews.title: the bad thing is that it doesn't hold heat long and ...
customer_reviews.text: it does really well. the bad thing is that it doesn't hold heat long and it started to rust after 2 weeks. its still pretty good for the price though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product came damaged and with no assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: This came to us damaged on both hinges. Luckily my husband is handy and will be able to fix it, but really disappointed since the box was NOT damaged it likely was packaged that way. Also there were no assembly instructions included! What the heck? Hopefully it ends up being a good smoker despite all this but very disappointed in the lack of quality control so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Kline

customer_reviews.title: Well-constructed; Considerable assembly required
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while (1/2 day) to assemble this heavy, well-made monster. But, it’s worth every ounce of labor. Temp holds well and very consistent burn regulation with my hardwood charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W Sutton

customer_reviews.title: great smoker, it beats my weber hands down
customer_reviews.text: nicely made, with a little rtv it seals very well and the space is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Sheron Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Good smoker
customer_reviews.text: It is what one needs for cooking. I enjoy smoked food and now I have what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the size
customer_reviews.text: I did need to seal it more after putting it together with a sealer for smokers. Other than that , I love this smoker. It’s a heavy gauge steel smoker. My neighbors are envious and I just used it to smoke 60 lbs of pork butt for my work. Is it a commercial type smoker? No, but it is a good weekend l smoker for a small party.
customer_reviews.author: Extremely Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Hung ribs and bacon great results!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve hot smoked on it now 3 times!! Love it easy to control temp. Firebox is a nice size. Clean up is a breeze. I have also used it for cold smoking cheese and it works great for that also! I used a pellet trey and it smoke for 5 hrs great air flow
customer_reviews.author: Jason Morin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The product came within a couple days. Definitely, a quality product. I am completely 1000% satisfied. The picture shows rack of pork spareribs, And on top rack, I had 6 two inch cut New York steaks n a few hot links. I could’ve fit at least another 25 pounds worth of meat in there. This is by far the best smoker I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy559

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Smoked 6 full racks of ribs by hanging them. Smoked evenly and was able to tend to them by spinning the hanger collar. Very nice setup. Great value for the money. Invest in the extra gasket and sealant to install while assembling. Much easier when the smoker is clean.
customer_reviews.author: Matt King

customer_reviews.title: You will not have it put together in an hour
customer_reviews.text: You will not have it put together in an hour.
customer_reviews.author: JamesElmer77

customer_reviews.title: Low grade
customer_reviews.text: Just received my smoker today and it was damaged. Dents and scratches. I'm very disappointed for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: So other than UPS taking my package around the country twice.....2 weeks later my smoker finally arrived. It was slightly damaged from its journey but nothing that will effect its efficiency. Went together very easily. Way better quality than what I have now!! Excited to try!!
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Defect in the front smoker door where the tempature gauge screws into
customer_reviews.text: The smoker is made in China and there is a defect in the slot on the front door where the temp gauge screws in. I've contacted the manufacture which is giving me a run around. I've already assembled the smoker and it weighs 135 lbs, so I cannot return it. I do not recommend this smoker nor this Company...
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kent

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Ok smoker. Make sure to buy some heat seal for the door. Fire box started to rust after second use. Customer service responds relatively quick, but it's been over a month since they ordered a new fire box for me and I still haven't received it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeb

customer_reviews.title: Love all the smoked meat and the cheese he makes
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this all the time and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY RONK

customer_reviews.title: Received Damaged - Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Received excessively dented and scratched, very poorly packaged. Door doesnt line up due to dented hinge. Leaks smoke. I had high hopes but this was an epic fail.
customer_reviews.author: AnUnbiasedReviewer

customer_reviews.title: For $300 it shouldn’t be dented and scuffed
customer_reviews.text: When we received the smoker the box was open on the top. After carrying the very heavy box to the back deck we pulled it out to discover several dents, and scuffs. Also prices missing. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Not air tight. Needs modifications.
customer_reviews.text: Don't forget to order sealing glue and stripping. These are not air tight.
customer_reviews.author: Froyo

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious smoker
customer_reviews.text: Very nice smoker , the temperature is a little tricky, lots of space for food.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this smoker. Took a bit longer to assemble than suggested but wasn't difficult. The temp is very easy to control and maintain. Lots of space to accommodate multiple items. Just enough space for a standard sized brisket you'd find in the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker!
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker the only reason I dropped it to 4 stars is that it was packaged poorly and has scratches all over it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent smoker but full of dents right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Happy with smoker, but arrived dented and dinged. Spent too much money on this to have to look at dents, dings and smashes every time we use it. The shipping box was not damaged but the smoker body looks like it was beaten with a hammer
customer_reviews.author: KLeslie

customer_reviews.title: Apple smoked
customer_reviews.text: I put this together myself and it only took me 30 mins. It was easy to put together and even easier to season and use. Best pushace ive made on a smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooker. Amazon delivery however can't read addresses. They delivered it to my neighbors house. Luckily I know my neighbors well. This thing is HEAVY. I had to drive my front end loader over to their house to bring it home.
customer_reviews.author: Don D.

product_meta.title: Dyna-Glo Signature Series DGSS1382VCS-D Heavy-Duty Vertical Offset Charcoal Smoker & Grill
product_meta.description: Style:Signature SmokerGet the best of both worlds with the Signature Series Heavy-Duty Vertical Offset Charcoal Smoker & Grill from Dyna-Glo. This multifunctional smoker lets you have it all with both grilling and offset smoking capacity. Smoke your pork shoulder low and slow or grill up burgers for the crew. For additional cooking space, simply use the offset for grilling sides or foods that require different temperatures. The smoker and offset cooking grates allow for maximum heat transfer and searing, and the professional-grade, stainless steel temperature gauge features "Grill Zone" and "Smoke Zone" indicators for maintaining an ideal cooking temperature. Become the envy of the neighborhood and upgrade your backyard with this Signature Series Heavy-Duty Vertical Offset Charcoal Smoker & Grill from Dyna-Glo. Do not use this smoker and grill as a heater

Cool-touch spring lid grip provides safer access to food
Stainless temperature gauge with "Smoke Zone" indicates the ideal temperature for infusing smoke flavor
Oversized steel wheels for mobility before and after use
